subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Women and Girls
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: SCA is the fifth all-female team to compete in the 40-year history of the around-the-world event, but it is notably not affiliated with a men’s team.
snippet: SCA is the fifth all-female team to compete in the 40-year history of the around-the-world event, but it is notably not affiliated with a men’s team.
